Texto: 
soft tissue swelling and extreme pain of the left shoulder.
splinting and decreased use.
radiograph of the left clavicle demonstrates a comminuted fracture with a butterfly fragment of the mid-clavicle.
butterfly fragment subtype of comminuted fracture.
comminuted fracture
patient fell on the ice during recent trip to alaska while getting off a train and landed on shoulder. she immediately heard a loud crack and had excruciating pain.
see factoid
